tuv.seg: With effect from 1 September 2016, new parents (other than the mother of the child) are entitled to paternity leave from employment or self-employment following birth or adoption of a child – see ‘Rules’ below for who is eligible
Ón 1 Meán Fómhair 2016 ar aghaidh, tá aithreacha i dteideal saoire atharthachta a ghlacadh ón bhfostaíocht nó ón bhféinfhostaíocht i ndiaidh go saolaítear a leanbh nó a uchtaítear leanbh
The Paternity Leave and Benefit Act 2016 provides for statutory paternity leave of 2 weeks
Foráiltear san Acht um Shaoire agus Sochar Atharthachta, 2016 do shaoire reachtúil atharthachta 2 sheachtain a ghlacadh
The provisions apply to births and adoptions on or after 1 September 2016
Baineann na forálacha le breitheanna agus le huchtáil a tharla an 1 Meán Fómhair 2016 nó ina dhiaidh sin
You can start paternity leave at any time within the first 6 months following the birth or adoption placement
Féadfaidh tú tús a chur le saoire atharthachta ag tráth ar bith laistigh de na chéad 6 mhí i ndiaidh na breithe nó an tsocrucháin uchtála
Payment during paternity leave
Íocaíocht i rith saoire atharthachta
Your entitlement to pay and superannuation during paternity leave depends on the terms of your contract of employment
Braitheann do theidlíocht do phá agus d’aoisliúntas i rith saoire atharthachta ar théarmaí do chonartha fostaíochta
Employers are not obliged to pay employees who are on paternity leave
Níl dualgas ar fhostóirí fostaithe a íoc atá ar shaoire atharthachta
You may qualify for Paternity Benefit from the Department of Social Protection if you have sufficient PRSI contributions
B’fhéidir go gcáileoidh tú do Shochar Atharthachta ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí má bhíonn ranníocaíochtaí leordhóthanacha ÁSPC agat

However an employee’s contract could provide for additional rights to payment by the employer during the leave period, so that, for example, the employee could receive full pay less the amount of Paternity Benefit payable

D’fhéadfadh go bhforálfaí i gconradh fostaí do chearta breise maidir le híocaíocht ag an bhfostóir i rith thréimhse na saoire, mar sin, mar shampla, d’fhéadfadh an fostaí pá iomlán a fháil, lúide méid an tSochair Atharthachta atá iníoctha
Under the Act, a “relevant parent” for the purposes of paternity leave entitlement includes:
Faoin Acht, airítear le “tuismitheoir ábhartha” ar mhaithe le cuspóirí na teidlíochta do shaoire atharthachta:
• The spouse, civil partner or cohabitant of the mother of the child
• Céile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó comháitritheoir mháthair an linbh
• The parent of a donor-conceived child
• Tuismitheoir linbh a ghin deontóir
In the case of an adopted child, the relevant parent includes:
I gcás linbh a uchtaíodh, áirítear leis an tuismitheoir ábhartha:
• The nominated parent in the case of a married same-sex couple or
• An tuismitheoir ainmnithe i gcás lánúin phósta chomhghnéis, nó
• The spouse, civil partner or cohabitant of the adopting mother or sole male adopter
• Céile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó comháitritheoir na máthar uchtála nó an uchtaitheora aonair fhirinn

The entitlement to 2 weeks’ paternity leave from employment extends to all employees (including casual workers), regardless of how long you have been working for the organisation or the number of hours worked per week

Tá gach fostaí i dteideal saoire atharthachta 2 sheachtain a fháil ón bhfostaíocht (oibrithe ócáideacha san áireamh), gan aird ar cé chomh fada atá tú ag oibriú don eagraíocht nó an líon uaireanta a oibríodh sa tseachtain
If more than one child is born or adopted at the same time, for example, twins, you are only entitled to a single period of 2 weeks’ paternity leave
Má dhéantar breis agus leanbh amháin a shaolú nó a uchtáil ag an tráth céanna, mar shampla, cúpla, ní bhíonn tú i dteideal ach saoire atharthachta 2 sheachtain a ghlacadh
You can choose to take paternity leave at any time in the 26 weeks following the birth or adoption
Féadfaidh tú a roghnú chun saoire atharthachta a ghlacadh ag tráth ar bith laistigh de na 26 seachtain i ndiaidh na breithe nó na huchtála
You must notify your employer in writing that you intend to take paternity leave and provide your intended dates no later than 4 weeks before your leave

Caithfidh tú fógra a thabhairt do d’fhostóir i scríbhinn go mbeartaíonn tú chun saoire atharthachta a ghlacadh agus chun do dhátaí beartaithe a sholáthar tráth nach déanaí ná 4 seachtaine roimh do shaoire

You will be required to provide a certificate from your spouse or partner's doctor confirming when your baby is due, or confirmation of the baby’s actual date of birth if you apply for leave after the birth has occurred

Beidh ort deimhniú a sholáthar ó dhochtúir do chéile nó do pháirtnéara shibhialta ina ndeimhnítear cathain a bhfuil súil leis go saolófar do leanbh, nó deimhniú maidir le dáta féin breithe an linbh má tá iarratas á dhéanamh agat i ndiaidh na breithe
In the case of adoption, you must produce a certificate of placement in relation to the child
I gcás uchtála, caithfidh tú deimhniú socrúcháin maidir leis an leanbh a sholáthar
The Paternity Leave and Benefit Act 2016 provides for postponement of paternity leave
Foráiltear san Acht um Shaoire agus Sochar Atharthachta, 2016 do shaoire atharthachta a chur siar
For example, if the birth is later than expected or if the date of placement of an adopted child is postponed, you may postpone the date of the leave
Mar shampla, má thagann an leanbh ar an saol níos déanaí ná mar a raibh súil leis nó má chuirtear dáta socrúcháin linbh uchtaithe siar, féadfaidh tú dáta na saoire a chur siar
Under Section 11, if you are sick before your paternity leave starts, you may postpone the paternity leave until you recover
Faoi Alt 11, má tá tú breoite sula dtosaíonn do shaoire atharthachta, féadfaidh tú an tsaoire atharthachta a chur siar go dtí go dtagann biseach ort
You should notify your employer in writing and provide evidence of your illness
Ba cheart duit d’fhostóir a chur ar an eolas i scríbhinn agus fianaise a sholáthar maidir le do bhreoiteacht
If your baby is hospitalised, you can ask your employer in writing if you can postpone all or part of your paternity leave
Má thugtar do leanbh chun ospidéil, féadfaidh tú iarraidh ar d’fhostóir i scríbhinn an féidir leat cuid de shaoire atharthachta nó an tsaoire go léir a chur siar
Public holidays and annual leave
Saoirí poiblí agus saoire bhliantúil
Apart from pay and superannuation, time spent on paternity leave is treated as though you have been in employment, and this time can be used to accumulate annual leave and public holiday entitlement

Seachas pá agus aoisliúntas, caitear leis an am a chaitear ar saoire atharthachta amhail go raibh tú fostaithe, agus féadtar an t-am seo a chur san áireamh chun teidlíocht do shaoire bhliantúil agus do shaoire phoiblí a ghlacadh
In certain circumstances, fathers are entitled to maternity or adoptive leave if the mother dies
Faoi chúinsí áirithe, bíonn aithreacha i dteideal saoire mháithreachais nó uchtaíoch má fhaigheann an mháthair bás
The extent of this period of leave depends on the actual date of the mother’s death
Braitheann fad na tréimhse seo ar dháta iarbhír bhás na máthar
The leave starts within 7 days of the mother's death
Cuirtear tús leis an tsaoire seo laistigh de 7 lá i ndiaidh bhás na máthar
If the father has not already taken paternity leave, he may take it at the end of this maternity or adoptive leave
Murar ghlac an t-athair le saoire atharthachta cheana féin, féadfaidh sé glacadh léi ag deireadh na saoire máithreachais nó uchtaíoch seo
If the parent entitled to paternity leave dies, their paternity leave may be transferred to the employed surviving parent
Má fhaigheann an tuismitheoir atá i dteideal saoire atharthachta a ghlacadh bás, féadtar a saoire atharthachta a aistriú chuig an tuismitheoir fostaithe marthanach
Employers must keep records of paternity leave taken by their employees
Caithfidh fostóirí taifid a choimeád ar shaoire atharthachta a ghlacann a bhfostaithe
These records must include the period of employment of each employee and the dates and times of the leave taken
Caithfear a chur san áireamh sna taifid seo tréimhse fostaíochta gach fostaí agus dátaí agus amanna na saoire a glacadh
Employers must keep these records for 8 years
Ní mór d’fhostóirí na taifid seo a choimeád ar feadh 8 mbliana
Under the Act, you are entitled to return to work to the same job with the same contract of employment
Faoin Acht, tá tú i dteideal filleadh ar obair agus ar an bpost céanna leis an gconradh céanna fostaíochta
Section 23 of the Act states that, if it is not reasonably practicable for your employer to allow you to return to your job, then they must provide you with suitable alternative work
Luaitear in Alt 23 den Acht, mura bhfuil sé indéanta go réasúnta go ligfidh d’fhostóir duit filleadh ar do phost, caithfidh siad obair oiriúnach eile a sholáthar duit
This new position should not be on terms substantially less favourable than those of your previous job
Ba cheart nach mbainfeadh téarmaí leis an bpost nua seo atá i bhfad níos mífhabhraí ná na téarmaí a bhain leis an bpost a bhí agat roimhe seo
You are protected against penalisation and unfair dismissal for claiming your rights under paternity leave legislation – see 'How to apply' below
Déantar thú a chosaint in aghaidh pionóis agus dífhostú éagórach i ngeall ar do chearta a éileamh faoin reachtaíocht um shaoire atharthachta – féach 'Conas iarratas a dhéanamh’ thíos
Employees may be entitled to parental leave
B’fhéidir go bhfuil fostaithe i dteideal saoire thuismitheoireachta
Parental leave entitles both parents who qualify to take a period of up to 18 weeks' unpaid leave from employment in respect of a child no later than the child's 8th birthday

Bronnann saoire thuismitheoireachta teidlíocht ar an mbeirt tuismitheoirí a cháilíonn chun glacadh le tréimhse a fhad le 18 seachtaine ón bhfostaíocht maidir le leanbh tráth nach déanaí ná breithlá 8 mbliana an linbh
Sole male adopters and adoptive mothers may be entitled to adoptive leave
D’fhéadfadh uchtaitheoirí agus máithreacha uchtála a bheith i dteideal saoire uchtaíoch a ghlacadh
If you need to take time off work urgently because of injury or illness of a close family member, you may be entitled to force majeure leave
Más gá duit am a ghlacadh saor ón obair go práinneach mar gheall ar ghortú nó breoiteacht duine mhuinteartha, d’fhéadfadh go mbeifeá i dteideal saoire force majeure a ghlacadh
If you need to provide full-time care for someone in need of full-time care and attention for a while, you can apply to take carer’s leave from your employment

Más gá duit cúram lánaimseartha a ghlacadh do dhuine éigin óna dteastaíonn cúram agus aire lánaimseartha ar feadh tréimhse áirithe ama, féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar shaoire chúramóra ó d’fhostaíocht
Arrangements where employers provide this type of paid leave following the birth or adoption of a child are the result of negotiation and agreement reached between the employer and employee
Tá socruithe ina soláthraíonn fostóirí an saghas seo de shaoire íoctha i ndiaidh breith nó uchtáil linbh mar thoradh ar idirbheartaíocht agus comhaontú a baineadh amach idir an fostóir agus an fostaí

These arrangements are not covered by employment law so if an employer agrees to provide time off to an employee as paternal leave for a specified period (either with or without pay), it is entirely discretionary

Ní chumhdaítear na socruithe seo faoin dlí fostaíochta, mar sin, má chomhaontaíonn fostóir chun am saor a sholáthar d’fhostaí mar shaoire atharthachta do thréimhse shonraithe (cé acu le pá nó gan phá), is faoi lánrogha an fhostóra a bhíonn sin
The employee usually applies for this leave in writing before the birth or adoption
Is gnách go ndéanann an fostaí iarratas ar an tsaoire seo i scríbhinn roimh an mbreith nó an uchtáil sin
You should apply to your employer in writing at least 4 weeks before taking your paternity leave
Ba cheart duit iarratas a dhéanamh le d’fhostóir i scríbhinn ar a laghad 4 seachtaine sula mbíonn sé beartaithe agat dul ar saoire atharthachta
If you are adopting a child, you must provide confirmation of the date of the child’s placement
Má tá leanbh á uchtú agat, caithfidh tú deimhniú a sholáthar maidir le dáta socrúcháin do linbh
You must provide your employer with proof of the expected date of confinement of your spouse or partner
Caithfidh tú cruthúnas a sholáthar do d’fhostóir maidir leis an dáta a bhfuil súil leis go dtabharfaidh do chéile nó páirtnéir an leanbh ar an saol

In other words, you will be required to provide a certificate from your spouse or partner's doctor confirming when your baby is due, or confirmation of the actual date of birth if you are applying for leave after the birth

I bhfriotal eile, beidh ort deimhniú a sholáthar ó dhochtúir do chéile nó do pháirtnéara shibhialta ina ndeimhnítear cathain a bhfuil súil leis go saolófar do leanbh, nó deimhniú maidir leis an dáta féin breithe má tá iarratas á dhéanamh agat i ndiaidh na breithe
If you need further information about paternity leave, you should contact the Workplace Relations Commission's Information and Customer Service
Má theastaíonn breis faisnéise uait faoi shaoire atharthachta, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh le Seirbhís Faisnéise agus do Chustaiméirí an Choimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Ionad Oibre

If you have a dispute with your employer about paternity leave, or if you have been dismissed for claiming your rights under paternity leave legislation, you may make a complaint within 6 months of the dispute or complaint occurring

Má bhíonn díospóid agat le d’fhostóir faoi shaoire atharthachta, nó má rinneadh thú a dhífhostú i ngeall ar do chearta faoin reachtaíocht um shaoire atharthachta a éileamh, féadfaidh tú gearán a dhéanamh laistigh de 6 mhí i ndiaidh gur thit an díospóid nó an t-ábhar gearáin amach
You must use the online complaint form available on workplacerelations.ie
Caithfidh tú an fhoirm ghearáin ar líne a úsáid atá ar fáil ag workplacerelations.ie
The time limit may be extended for up to a further 6 months, but only where there is a reasonable cause which prevented the complaint being brought within the normal time limit
Féadtar síneadh ama a fhad le 6 mhí a chur leis an teorainn ama, ach amháin sa chás go bhfuil údar réasúnta ann a chuir cosc ar an ngearán a dhéanamh laistigh den ghnáth-theorainn ama
Paternity Benefit: You should apply for Paternity Benefit at least 4 weeks before the date you intend to start your paternity leave
Sochar Atharthachta: Ba cheart duit iarratas a dhéanamh ar Shochar Atharthachta ar a laghad 4 seachtaine sula mbíonn sé beartaithe agat tús a chur le do shaoire atharthachta
If you are self-employed you should apply 12 weeks before
Má tá tú féinfhostaithe, ba cheart duit iarratas a dhéanamh 12 sheachtain roimh ré
You will be able to apply for Paternity Benefit online at mywelfare.ie
Beidh tú in ann iarratas a dhéanamh ar Shochar Atharthachta ar líne ag mywelfare.ie
You must have a Public Services Card to apply for Paternity Benefit. Where to apply Workplace Relations Commission
Caithfidh Cárta Seirbhísí Poiblí a bheith agat chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar Shochar Atharthachta
